feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode variants, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React SPA implementing navigation, sections, product listings, contact CTAs, and scroll-based active section tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook for managing Internet Identity auth client, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining warm OKLCH palette, typography scaling, dark mode, and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, including schema version, feature list, content requirements, and needed images for the Bhatoa Traders website.
